title.rendered: Which Smartphone Should You Buy In 2022?

content.rendered:
Sometimes picking the right smartphone for you can be quite an overwhelming process. There are so many options out there that range in display size, battery capacity, weight and so on. We at Fonehouse believe you deserve the best handset possible, at an affordable price too. So we’ve compiled a list of our top pick 2022 handsets and their specs. Have a scroll through this list and find your perfect fit. 

Honor Magic4 Pro 5G

Released in May 2022, the Honor Magic4 Pro 5G exceeded the expectations of tech lovers around the world, including myself who got the chance to write a review for the flagship handset. The initial specs & stand-out features of this device include: 

Honor Magic4 Pro 5G Specs:

  • Weight: 215g
  • Screen Size: 6.81”
  • Battery Capacity: 4600 mAh + Dual HONOR SuperCharge 10W
  • Rear Camera: Triple: 50MP (wide). 50MP (ultrawide), 64MP (periscope telephoto) + Digital zoom 100X

Honor Magic4 Pro 5G Features:

  • A Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset – giving users a super speedy performance with every use
  • Curved LTPO OLED First Class Display with a DCI-P3 wide colour gamut – which effortlessly injects vibrancy into visuals 
  • Movie Master & IMAX Enhanced Certification – giving users cinema-worthy high-quality imagery
  • IP68 rated certification (water and dust resistance) – perfect for protecting your device from all your clumsy moments. 

Our prices on this Honor handset start from as little as £34/mo.

iPhone 13 Pro Max 5G

Launched in September 2021, the flagship handset for Apple, the iPhone 13 Pro Max 5G wowed the iPhone obsessed. The specs and top features of this handset are as follows: 

iPhone 13 Pro Max 5G Specs: 

  • Weight: 240g
  • Screen Size: 6.7” Super Retina XDR display
  • Battery Capacity: 4352mAH
  • Rear Camera: Triple: 12MP (wide), 12MP (telephoto), 12MP (ultrawide)

iPhone 13 Pro Max 5G Features:

  • A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance
  • Durable design with Ceramic Shield
  • Industry-leading IP68 water resistance
  • 12MP TrueDepth front camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
  • Dual 12MP front-facing camera 

Our prices on this Apple handset start from £49/mo

Samsung Galaxy S21 FE 5G

The Samsung Galaxy S21 FE 5G launch brought January 2022 in with a bang. Not only is this 5G handset an affordable option, but it also has some fantastic features under its belt. 

Samsung Galaxy S21 FE 5G Specs

  • Weight: 177g
  • Screen Size: 6.4” Dynamic AMOLED 2X
  • Battery Capacity: 4500 mAh with 25W fast charging 
  • Rear Camera: Pro grade triple: 12MP (wide), 8MP (telephoto), 12MP (ultrawide)

Samsung Galaxy S21 FE Features:

  • Fast wireless charging 2.0 (15W) – Gain a 50% charge in less than 30 minutes 
  • 32MP front-facing camera for picture-perfect selfies
  • Powerful Snapdragon 888 chipset for an efficient performance with every use 
  • Durable Gorilla Glass screen 
  • Night mode & 30X Space Zoom

Our prices on this Samsung Galaxy handset start from as little as £20/mo.

Google Pixel 6 Pro 5G

The Google Pixel 6 Pro 5G released in October 2021 has been labelled as the ‘smartest and fastest Pixel yet’- a bold but true statement. Here are some of the specs and features you can expect: 

Google Pixel 6 Pro 5G Specs:

  • Weight: 210g
  • Screen Size: 6.71” LTPO AMOLED 
  • Battery Capacity: 5004 mAh with fast wired (30W) & wireless charging (23W)
  • Rear Camera: Triple: 50MP (wide), 48MP (telephoto), 12MP (ultrawide) 

Google Pixel 6 Pro 5G Features: 

  • Highest rated for security thanks to Google Tensor chipset and Titan M2 security chip
  • High durability due to Gorilla Glass display and rated IP68 water/dust resistance. 
  • 120Hz refresh rate for immersive and responsive gaming and general scrolling
  • Battery with the ability to last over 24 hours 

Our prices on this Google Pixel handset start from as little as £33/mo.

You’re now all filled in about the wonderful specs and features the Honor Magic4 Pro 5G, the iPhone 13 Pro Max 5G, the Samsung Galaxy S21 FE 5G and the Google Pixel 6 Pro have to offer, now it’s time to get your hands on a shiny new handset of your own. We’ve got all handsets mentioned above at the best prices!
